LanguageData.PsychiteAddiction.label: psychite addiction
LanguageData.PsychiteAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to psychite. Long-term presence of psychite has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug.\n\nWithout regular doses of psychite from drugs like flake or yayo, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.PsychiteTolerance.label: psychite tolerance
LanguageData.PsychiteTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to psychite. The more severe this tolerance is, the more psychite-based drugs like yayo or flake it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.PsychiteTolerance.stages.small.label: small
LanguageData.PsychiteTolerance.stages.large.label: large
LanguageData.PsychiteTolerance.stages.massive.label: massive
LanguageData.YayoHigh.label: high on yayo
LanguageData.YayoHigh.description: Active yayo in the bloodstream. Generates an intense euphoric high.
